医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
污染转移：卡车电气化如何将负担转移到电厂重型卡车使重型卡车降低了道路排放，但会使污染负担转移到发电厂，尽管有整体的空气质量改善，但处境不利的社区仍面临更高的接触。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/pollution-shift-how-how-truck-electrification-moves-the-ben-the-brenden-the-bourden-to-power-plants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/pollution-shift-shift-how-truck-electrification-moves-the-brenden-the-b the-burden-to-power-plants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06419242-8F52-43EB-9B63-4BBDE1737E23 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 22:02:00 -0500 Pollution shift: How truck electrification moves the burden to power plants
新的生物标志物可以准确预测脑膜瘤和乳腺癌的结果使用新技术和计算方法，来自弗雷德·哈奇癌中心和德克萨斯大学医学博士安德森癌症中心的研究人员发现了一种能够准确预测脑膜瘤脑肿瘤和乳腺癌的结局的生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/new-biomarker-can-accurpredict-predictcomes-in-meningiomas-and-breast-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/new-biomarker-can-can-curpery-predict-comcomes-in-meningiomas-and-breast-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e750E670-42B4-42B4-49C8-A82B-EF81C9A036BC Thu, 13 Feb 2025 22:02:00 -0500 New biomarker can accurately predict outcomes in meningiomas and breast cancers
长期身体健康状况的抑郁症患者根据研究出版于2月13日，在开放式通行期刊PLOS医学上，具有抑郁症病史的成年人的长期身体状况比没有抑郁症的身体状况快30％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/people-with-depression-depression-and-higher-risk-for-long-term-term-phys-physical-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/people-with-depression-depression-and-higher-risk-for-long-term-term-phys-physical-health-tealth-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfe99db7-9ca6-4e14-a8d1-a8d1-a97cb7955849 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 21:58:54 -0500 People with depression at higher risk for long-term physical health conditions
Gene Silencer的发现为常染色体主导性白细胞营养不良提供了希望由匹兹堡大学公共卫生遗传学家领导的一支小组首次表明，居住在垃圾DNA中的基因“消音器”直接使人们免于毁灭性和致命的进步神经系统疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/discovery-of-gene-gene-silencer-finders-news-hope-for-autosomal-dominal-leukodystrophy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/discovery-of-gene-gene-silencer-renders-news-hope-for-autosomal-dominal-dominat--leukodystrophy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b87a777c-d594-462e-a1c0-6fd4926faab6 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 21:50:15 -0500 Discovery of gene silencer offers hope for autosomal dominant leukodystrophy
薄荷香烟有助于吸烟者的死亡率更高在美国癌症协会（ACS）领导的一项大型全国研究中，研究人员发现，吸烟薄荷醇烟的死亡风险高于任何原因和心血管疾病，尤其是心脏病，尤其是心脏病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/menthol-cigarettes-contribute-to-higher-death-rates-in-smokers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/menthol-cigarettes-contribute-to-higher-death-rates-in-smokers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1eb6616a-e20b-49c7-8bbd-ee5ce29f7f33 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 21:46:17 -0500 Menthol cigarettes contribute to higher death rates in smokers
研究揭示了与人类创造力相关的脑电路大众杨百翰（Mass Brigham）研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，由创意任务激活的不同大脑区域是一个普通大脑电路的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/study-reveals-brain-circuit-linked-to-human-creativity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/study-reveals-reveals-brain-circuit-linked-to-human-creativity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=746EE8AE-77F0-42B6-8FC5-320770BE96999 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 21:42:30 -0500 Study reveals brain circuit linked to human creativity
重新思考红肉：饮食指南是否缺少更大的情况？研究突出了红肉在提供铁，锌和B12等必需营养素中的关键作用，尤其是对于弱势群体，同时质疑将其与慢性疾病联系起来的低确定性证据。它敦促决策者在考虑饮食指南时平衡健康，环境和经济因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/rethinking-rethinking-red-meat-are-are-dietary-dietary-guidelines-missing-the-bigger-picture.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/rethinking-rethinking-red-meat-are-are-dietary-dietary-guidelines-missing-the-bigger-picture.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9eb765f1-afcf-49BB-9BA3-4317E3ADEC06 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 21:36:00 -0500 Rethinking red meat: Are dietary guidelines missing the bigger picture?
与流感相关的神经系统事件对患有神经系统疾病的儿童构成更大的风险许多临床医生在讨论与家族的流感疫苗接种或治疗流感时不考虑流感的神经系统并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/flu-related-neurologic-events-events-pose-pose-pose-groter-cose-for-child-children-with-pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-satisting-neurologic-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/flu-related-neurologic-events-events-events-pose-pose-pose-greater-risk-for-children----------------------------------------------------- neurologic-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3A9072E-491A-491A-4321-B8BC-BEFF6D21ADB9 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 21:27:02 -0500 Flu-related neurologic events pose greater risk for children with pre-existing neurologic conditions
在线体重管理计划帮助农村居民减肥居住在农村地区的人们比一般人群面临肥胖的风险更大，而且他们获得健康，负担得起的食物，体育锻炼设施，公共交通和医疗保健机构的机会通常有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/online-weight-management-management-program-helps-helps-helps-helps-rural-cousdents-lose-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/online-weight-management-management-program-helps-helps-helps-helps-rural-cousdents-lose-weight-weight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=630de66666666666666666666666666666666666666666-AB1B-C06D419B4E3E Thu, 13 Feb 2025 21:21:59 -0500 Online weight management program helps rural residents lose weight
酸奶可以帮助防止某些结直肠癌吗？新研究探讨了链接常规的酸奶摄入量可能会降低双歧杆菌阳性大肠癌的风险，尤其是在近端结肠上，但不会降低双歧杆菌阴性肿瘤的风险。需要进一步的研究来确认这些发现并了解酸奶在肠道健康和癌症预防中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/could-yogurt-help-prevent-clevent-coled-coleorcolorectal-colororectal-cancers-new-study-sexplores-explores-the-link.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/could-yogurt-help-prevent-clevent-clovent-colorororecloreclorecloreclorectal-cancers-new-study-esplores-explores-explores-the-link.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4695d835-e2ee-4fcc-b1f9-ef823ecb6081 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 21:14:00 -0500 Could yogurt help prevent certain colorectal cancers? New study explores the link
